old_value: {"id":"orcas-cpn","title":"Wrong date for today's agenda","description":"In the morning, the calendar shown in the today section shows yesterday's events. It resolves in the afternoon (Sydney time) making me think that the query is using the UTC date, rather than the local date","status":"open","priority":0,"issue_type":"task","owner":"andrew@seatrain.net","created_at":"2026-02-17T10:58:12Z","created_by":"Andrew Craig","updated_at":"2026-02-17T10:58:12Z"}

new_value: Fixed UTC vs local timezone issue in three places: TodayPage.tsx, TodayTaskList.tsx (toISOString→local date components), and calendar.rs (Utc→Local for event times)

old_value: {"id":"orcas-cgo","title":"Epic: Tag calendar events to spaces","description":"Enable users to associate calendar events with spaces/projects. Events from macOS EventKit are currently ephemeral with no app-level persistence. This epic adds a mapping table, backend commands, and UI to tag events to spaces and display them in context.","status":"open","priority":2,"issue_type":"feature","owner":"andrew@seatrain.net","created_at":"2026-02-23T14:25:36Z","created_by":"Andrew Craig","updated_at":"2026-02-23T14:25:36Z"}

{"id":"orcas-cgo","title":"Epic: Tag calendar events to spaces","description":"Enable users to associate calendar events with spaces/projects. Events from macOS EventKit are currently ephemeral with no app-level persistence. This epic adds a mapping table, backend commands, and UI to tag events to spaces and display them in context.","status":"open","priority":2,"issue_type":"epic","owner":"andrew@seatrain.net","created_at":"2026-02-23T14:25:36Z","created_by":"Andrew Craig","updated_at":"2026-02-23T14:26:02Z"}

{"id":"orcas-8yz","title":"Add event_space_associations DB migration","description":"Create migration 022 adding event_space_associations table with columns: id (PK), space_id (FK to spaces), event_id_external (TEXT, EventKit ID), event_title (TEXT, cached), associated_date (DATE), created_at. Add UNIQUE constraint on (space_id, event_id_external, associated_date). Add ON DELETE CASCADE for space_id FK.","status":"open","priority":2,"issue_type":"task","owner":"andrew@seatrain.net","created_at":"2026-02-23T14:25:41Z","created_by":"Andrew Craig","updated_at":"2026-02-23T14:25:41Z"}

{"id":"orcas-oet","title":"Add Tauri commands for event-space tagging","description":"Add backend Tauri commands in lib.rs: (1) tag_event_to_space(space_id, event_id, event_title, event_date) - insert association, (2) untag_event_from_space(space_id, event_id) - delete association, (3) get_event_space_tags(event_id) - return spaces tagged to an event, (4) get_space_events(space_id, start_date, end_date) - return event associations for a space within date range. All commands use the global DB pool pattern from settings.rs.","status":"open","priority":2,"issue_type":"task","owner":"andrew@seatrain.net","created_at":"2026-02-23T14:25:44Z","created_by":"Andrew Craig","updated_at":"2026-02-23T14:25:44Z"}

{"id":"orcas-eed","title":"Add TypeScript API wrappers and types for event tagging","description":"Add to types.ts: EventSpaceAssociation interface { id, space_id, event_id_external, event_title, associated_date, created_at }. Add to api.ts: tagEventToSpace(), untagEventFromSpace(), getEventSpaceTags(), getSpaceEvents() wrapping the new Tauri commands.","status":"open","priority":2,"issue_type":"task","owner":"andrew@seatrain.net","created_at":"2026-02-23T14:25:46Z","created_by":"Andrew Craig","updated_at":"2026-02-23T14:25:46Z"}

{"id":"orcas-4ji","title":"Add space tagging UI to EventPopover","description":"Update EventPopover.tsx to include a 'Tag to Space' action. Show a dropdown/selector listing available spaces (with color dots). Allow tagging/untagging the event to one or more spaces. Show currently tagged spaces as removable chips. Use Primer React components (ActionMenu, ActionList, Label). Load spaces list and current tags on popover open.","status":"open","priority":2,"issue_type":"task","owner":"andrew@seatrain.net","created_at":"2026-02-23T14:25:49Z","created_by":"Andrew Craig","updated_at":"2026-02-23T14:25:49Z"}

{"id":"orcas-04a","title":"Show space badges on tagged events in AgendaView","description":"Update AgendaView.tsx to display small colored dots or badges next to events that are tagged to spaces. Fetch event-space associations for all visible events. Show space color indicator matching the space's color property. Keep it subtle - small dot or inline label, not overwhelming.","status":"open","priority":2,"issue_type":"task","owner":"andrew@seatrain.net","created_at":"2026-02-23T14:25:52Z","created_by":"Andrew Craig","updated_at":"2026-02-23T14:25:52Z"}

{"id":"orcas-8j5","title":"Add Upcoming Events section to SpaceHome","description":"Update SpaceHome.tsx to include an 'Upcoming Events' section showing calendar events tagged to this space. Fetch associations for the space, then cross-reference with EventKit events for the upcoming 7 days. Display event title, date/time, and location. Allow untagging from this view. Place section appropriately in the two-column layout (likely in left column above or below task list).","status":"open","priority":2,"issue_type":"task","owner":"andrew@seatrain.net","created_at":"2026-02-23T14:25:55Z","created_by":"Andrew Craig","updated_at":"2026-02-23T14:25:55Z"}

{"id":"orcas-2hq","title":"Update Today page to match new Figma design","description":"Redesign TodayPage, AgendaView, and TodayTaskList components to match the Figma mockup at node 22:185. Key changes: page header, two-column layout with Agenda/Priority Tasks, chat input bar at bottom, tasks grouped by space, simplified agenda cards.","status":"open","priority":2,"issue_type":"feature","owner":"andrew@seatrain.net","created_at":"2026-02-24T10:26:55Z","created_by":"Andrew Craig","updated_at":"2026-02-24T10:26:55Z"}
